info.title: WAX marketcap
info.description: General usage statistics of the WAX Blockchain. Provided with pride by Hive Digital UG

get.description: Get the all time top sales on the WAX blockchain

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Set the result offset (skip the first x results)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results

200.description: All-time metrics of sales that happened on the WAX blockchain, ordered by price (descending).

get.description: Get the top sales on the WAX blockchain in the last x days

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The amount of days to fetch data for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Set the result offset (skip the first x results)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results

200.description: Metrics of sales that happened in the last x days on the WAX blockchain, ordered by price (descending).

get.description: Get the top sales from a specific author on the WAX blockchain in the last x days

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The amount of days to fetch data for

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The sale's author to fetch data for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Set the result offset (skip the first x results)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results

200.description: Metrics of sales by the given author that happened in the last x days on the WAX blockchain, ordered by price (descending).

get.description: Get sales metrics for all collections for the last x days, including the trend data for the last seven days, filtered by type.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The amount of days to fetch data for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type to filter by

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: A term to filter by / search for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Set the result offset (skip the first x results)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results

200.description: Sales metrics for the last x days, as well as trend data for the last seven days for each collection, filtered by type.

get.description: Returns the total sales volume (amount and price) on the WAX blockchain from the last x days.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The amount of days to fetch data for

200.description: The total sales volume (amount and price) on the WAX blockchain from the last x days.

get.description: Returns the total sales volume (amount and price) on the WAX blockchain from the last x days for a given collection.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The amount of days to fetch data for

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to fetch data for

200.description: The total sales volume (amount and price) on the WAX blockchain from the last x days for a given collection.

get.description: Get general information about a Schema

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the collection to fetch schemas for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the collection search: inventory, drops, etc, to get relevant collections

parameters.name: tag_id
parameters.description: Tag of the collection (Nostalgia, Comics, Sci-Fi, etc)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of results to start from

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Filter by verification level: verified, unverified, all or blacklisted (excluded from all)

parameters.name: trending
parameters.description: Filter by trending collections: Volume raised week over week, over a certain limit

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Filter for collections listed on a certain market

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Filter for collections owned by a certain user

parameters.name: pfps_only
parameters.description: Filter by PFP collections

200.description: List of Collections

get.description: Get a list of templates

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: A user entered search term

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: A collection to filter by

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: A schema to filter by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to filter by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of results to start from

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Filter by templates recently sold within the last month, hour, week or day

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Filter by verification level: verified, unverified, all or blacklisted (excluded from all)

parameters.name: favorites
parameters.description: Filter favorited templates by user

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User executing the query

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: What to sort by and in which direction, like date_desc, template_id_asc

parameters.name: exact_search
parameters.description: When given a search term, search only exactly for the given term

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Searching for templates that are packs, pfps or rwax compatible

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Filter for templates that have attributes like rarity Common and level 5

200.description: List of Template Data

get.description: Get a list of templates

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: A user entered search term

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: An asset owner to filter by

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: A collection to filter by

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: A schema to filter by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to filter by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of results to start from

parameters.name: min_mint
parameters.description: Minimum mint number of an asset to filter by

parameters.name: max_mint
parameters.description: Maximum mint number of an asset to filter by

parameters.name: min_average
parameters.description: Minimum average price of an asset to filter by

parameters.name: max_average
parameters.description: Maximum average price of an asset to filter by

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Filter by templates recently sold within the last month, hour, week or day

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Filter by verification level: verified, unverified, all or blacklisted (excluded from all)

parameters.name: favorites
parameters.description: Filter favorited templates by user

parameters.name: backed
parameters.description: Filter by backed assets

parameters.name: contract
parameters.description: Filter by asset contract, eg simpleassets or atomicassets

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User executing the query

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: What to sort by and in which direction, like date_desc, template_id_asc

parameters.name: exact_search
parameters.description: When given a search term, search only exactly for the given term

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Define search type, assets (default), duplicates (req. owner), lowest_mints (req.owner)

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Filter for assets that have attributes like rarity Common and level 5

parameters.name: only
parameters.description: Filter for assets are packs, pfps, rwax supported assets or staked assets

parameters.name: rwax_symbol
parameters.description: Filter by rwax supported assets of a certain token symbol

parameters.name: rwax_contract
parameters.description: Filter by rwax supported assets of a certain token contract

200.description: List of Template Data

get.description: Get a list of listings

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: A user entered search term

parameters.name: seller
parameters.description: A seller to filter by

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: A market contract to filter by

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: A collection to filter by

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: A schema to filter by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of results to start from

parameters.name: min_mint
parameters.description: Minimum mint number of a listed asset to filter by

parameters.name: max_mint
parameters.description: Maximum mint number of a listed asset to filter by

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Minimum price to filter by

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Maximum price to filter by

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Filter by templates recently sold within the last month, hour, week or day

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Filter by verification level: verified, unverified, all or blacklisted (excluded from all)

parameters.name: favorites
parameters.description: Filter favorited templates by user

parameters.name: contract
parameters.description: Filter by asset contract, eg simpleassets or atomicassets

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User executing the query

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: What to sort by and in which direction, like date_desc, price_asc

parameters.name: exact_search
parameters.description: When given a search term, search only exactly for the given term

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Define search type, listings (default), floor (eq template floor price), missing (req. owner), below_average

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Filter for listings of assets that have attributes like rarity Common and level 5

parameters.name: only
parameters.description: Filter for listings of pfps, rwax supported assets or backed assets

parameters.name: rwax_symbol
parameters.description: Filter by rwax supported assets of a certain token symbol

parameters.name: rwax_contract
parameters.description: Filter by rwax supported assets of a certain token contract

200.description: List of Template Data
